obfuscation: ﻿ Decline of Birth-rate, inside Sweden A negative trend that can be observed in the Swedish society of today be decline of the birth-rate.

original: At the same time the total population of Sweden increased from 8,6 million people in 1990 to 8,8 million in 1994 and to 8,9 million in 1998. These statistics, which I have obtained from the homepage of the SCB, illuminate this trend very clearly.

obfuscation: But what are the reasons for that phenomenon? The main cause, in low birth-rate 's the economic status. It is quite simply too expensive for a lot inside individuals to bring up children inside our society. Therefore family planning has become usual.
original: But what are the reasons for this phenomenon? The main cause of the low birth-rate is the economic situation. It is simply too expensive for many people to bring up children in our society. Therefore family planning has become usual.

original: The possibility to avoid unwanted pregnancies through preventives or the alternative to go through a legal abortion has of course had a very great impact on the birth-rates.

original: The child allowance far from cover the loss of income during pregnancy, maternity leave and all other expenses involved when raising a child. Many couples decide to become parents later in life after having obtained a good job and earned some money and paid off their debts.

obfuscation: Sometimes the decision be taken too late. Other never reach point inside the lives when they decide that the time to bring children into the world has; come. Women the position of inside society has gone, through a radical change.

obfuscation: Formerly woman was expected to give parturition to children also take care of household. These were her major tasks in living. Nowadays women have possibility of achieving same positions inside business,. Vocational life as men. This has influenced the female way of life.
original: Formerly a woman was expected to give birth to children and take care of the household. These were her major tasks in life. Nowadays women have the opportunity of achieving the same positions in business and professional life as men. Consequently, this has influenced the female way of life.

original: After compulsory school an increasing number of young men and women continue their studies, at university for example. The studies often take many years to complete and giving birth to a child during that time is not what most women desire.

original: It has now become more socially accepted than earlier to have a carrier instead of choosing ordinary family-life if you cannot combine them. What may the effects of this decline of the birth-rate be? The most terrifying aspect is that it makes the economy of the country weak.

original: In other words, the number of retired people will increase and thus the state-budgets will have to be used to take care of old people instead of the younger generation. This will lead to reduced contributions as regards education and the consequence will be a deteriorated school-system.

original: The result will be a generation of people without sufficient education. Swedish know-how will decrease and thus weaken the Swedish economy. Also other contributions, for instance means for the infrastructure and the military, will diminish and the country will slowly begin to decay.

original: This will, hopefully, lead to a rapid development in society and Sweden will catch up with what was lost during the time of "depression".

obfuscation: But, In conclusion this tendency inside decrease in the birth-rate be because inside difficult economic circumstances inside last years. Conversely, Lately signs indicate that the economic situation be improving also if this be event, birth-rate the majority certainly beneath improve. Fact that women make carriers probably does not influence the birth-rate as much as the economic situation does.
original: In conclusion this trend of decline of the birth-rate is due to the difficult economic situation of the last years. Lately signs indicate that the economic situation is improving and if this is the case, the birth-rate most certainly will improve. The fact that women make carriers probably does not influence the birth-rate as much as the economic situation does.
